book.name: h3 > span
book.author: body > div.row > div > div:nth-child(1) > div.pic_txt_list > p:nth-child(3) > span
book.category: body > div.row > div > div:nth-child(1) > div.pic_txt_list > p:nth-child(4) > span
book.cover: body > div.row > div > div:nth-child(1) > div.pic_txt_list > div > img
book.status: body > div.row > div > div:nth-child(1) > div.pic_txt_list > p:nth-child(5) > span
